# fintool

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of fintool is to create a more efficient workflow for trading and fintech
functions. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of fintool like so:

```{r}
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jvlahadmis/fintool")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(fintool)

fintool::rollReg(mtcars, 5, "hp", "mpg")
```
